item.title: Libvirt
item.description:
virsh 命令

virsh domifaddr 查看虚拟机网卡ip

# virsh domifaddr k3s-node01 --source lease
 Name MAC address Protocol Address
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

通过arp获取网卡ip

# virsh domifaddr k3s-node01 --source arp
 Name MAC address Protocol Address
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 vnet18 52:54:00:0e:08:02 ipv4 192.168.1.248/0
